reviews.review: 手感不错，服务器也不少，但我一直是玩低延迟，暂时没试过高延迟。可以重温沙漠2和火车站，其中还有个csgo的地图。混战模式很爽。赞

Counter-Strike: Source is an amazing, simple, realistic, competitive, team oriented game. 

I would highly recommend this game to anyone in which is looking for a new competitive fps based game. Minor the old graphics this game has tons of content. From the online maps; to the private servers you can join to play with fellow friends. The opportunity is endless within this game.

9/10 is the rating I give this game. 

Would recommend!
É um jogo que nunca perderá o favoritismo.
Great game. Brings you back to the roots of CS. Super fun, worth a play :)

So before a good gent uploaded all the textures from this game to the Gmod workshop in 7 addons, you had to buy this game just to see 90% of the maps in Gmod.

Now this game is completely pointless!

CS:GO is literally just this but made better (for people who like that kind of repetitive game), so if you like how this game looks, go play CS:GO because it's free.
Игра прикольная я считаю эта самоя лучшая часть Counter-Strike

je me fais tué en une balle pendant que les adversaires se prennent parfois 1 grenade (peut etre 50 de degats) et se prennent mes balles sans mourir tandis que moi une seule balle et je meurs direct je ne comprend pas.

ебаный задрот

на сервере запрещено:
*использование читов, распрыжек, скриптов и прочих хитростей
*использование спреев-обманок и спреев с эротическим содержанием
*использование уязвимостей карт
*мат в любом проявлении
слово "сука" хоть и литературное, но на сервере расценивается как мат
*оскорбления игроков
*использование нечитаемых ников, ников содежащие мат, цифровых ников

всё это карается баном
ЧИТЕРОВ НАМНОГО МЕНЬШЕ И ФИЗИКА НОРМ
Запасной варик, когдав кс отлетел ( counter strike global offensive - parasha)
Bhopping is fun, otherwise its the bastard son of the cs trilogy

Советую поиграть сначала в данную версию CSS,затем переходить в CSGO.)
游戏很不错，但是玩多了会腻，希望多出些新模式

This game is great. Like all of the cs games. But I feel the all of the mechanics just don't work as well as the others. The head hitbox is so massive that in my first hour of playing. I got an ace with just a deagle. Don't even get me started on the AWP either. All of the mechanics are there and it has good potential. But it just falls flat. And is (in my opinion) The worst counter-strike game.
It has always a great game to play.
love this game reminds me of being a kid
vraiment sympa pour un fps a l'ancienne simple
игра старая но всё ещё класс
крутая игруля, можно погрузится в ностольгию

Esta version del Counter Strike es ideal para casi todas las computadoras/notebooks al ser un juego optimo y bien diseñado, lo cual lo hace mas accesible que el CS:GO que por mi experiencia lo podia jugar fluidamente pero a medida que se actualizaba ya no lo pude jugar. El Source es ideal para disfrutar!
游戏环境好，玩10个小时没有看见一个外挂，其他都还行，但对新手不是很友好。
